title: Santa Barbara Spanish-Style Glamour near State Street with Rooftop Pool
description: Between swaying palms, red-tiled rooftops and the Pacific Ocean's endless blue, Kimpton Canary Hotel, an IHG Hotel, offers a uniquely sophisticated Spanish-style retreat in the heart of Santa Barbara, just moments from State Street, the city’s most celebrated avenue. Spend sun-kissed moments lazing by the hotel’s spectacular rooftop pool, before savouring exquisite coastal-focused cuisine and uniquely Californian drops at onsite Finch & Fork.
location_description: Kimpton Canary Hotel, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 31 West Carrillo St, Santa Barbara, California 93101, United States
